forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5pm. Sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 63, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. South southwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. Northwest wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 37. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 0 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
